title: The Power of the Individual: A Talk about Race with Eric
description:
Being a white woman in Canada, I am far removed from the happenings south of the border since the murder of George Floyd. Eric was kind enough to share his perspective with me.

Listen on podcast here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-Power-of-the-Individual-A-Talk-about-Race-with-Eric-efec22

Follow Eric on Instagram and twitter @ericselectrons

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
email me andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
